title: AAA-quality graphics upgrade for Pepe Survival (2D)

requirements.summary: Replace/retouch all core art assets with AAA-quality static raster graphics and ensure crisp rendering on high-DPI displays.
acceptanceCriteria: New high-fidelity raster assets exist under frontend/public/assets/generated using the filenames specified in this build request.
All upgraded assets render sharply (no visible pixelation) at common desktop and mobile resolutions.
No assets are served through the backend; all art is loaded from static files.
The game remains playable and performance remains stable (no obvious frame drops attributable to rendering changes).

file_operations.description: Replace with the rethemed AAA-quality Pepe/toad-killer crypto meme logo (keep exact filename and static serving).
Replace with the rethemed AAA-quality menu/results background (keep exact filename and static serving).
Replace with higher-detail in-game background (same composition; keep exact filename and static serving).
Replace with higher-detail token icon (keep silhouette readability; keep exact filename and static serving).
Replace with higher-detail toad hazard icon (keep silhouette readability; keep exact filename and static serving).
Update/standardize the cohesive custom icon sheet to match the AAA Pepe/toad-killer aesthetic (static file; keep exact filename).

Add static asset preloads for frontend/public/assets/generated/game-logo.dim_512x512.png, menu-background.dim_1920x1080.png, ingame-background.dim_1920x1080.png, token-icon.dim_256x256.png, toad-hazard-icon.dim_256x256.png, and ui-icons-sheet.dim_1024x1024.png to reduce perceived loading and support crisp first paint.
Create a single source-of-truth module exporting the static paths for all generated assets (logo, backgrounds, icons, sheet) so all UI/canvas references remain consistent and remain static-file-only.

Wire upgraded static assets via the generated assets module: use frontend/public/assets/generated/menu-background.dim_1920x1080.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/game-logo.dim_512x512.png with sizing/attributes that preserve sharpness on retina/high-DPI displays.

Wire upgraded static background via the generated assets module: use frontend/public/assets/generated/menu-background.dim_1920x1080.png for premium results presentation while keeping all existing flows and English text unchanged.

requirements.summary: Increase 2D canvas renderer fidelity with higher-quality sprite rendering, layered/parallax composition, atmospheric overlays, and improved particles/VFX while respecting Reduced Motion and preserving gameplay logic.
acceptanceCriteria: The canvas scene (background, player, obstacles, power-ups, particles) no longer relies on simple fallback circles/glows when the new assets are available.
When Reduced Motion is enabled, any new camera/scene motion effects (e.g., shake/parallax) are disabled or substantially reduced, consistent with existing behavior.
Visual effects upgrades do not introduce gameplay logic changes (collision and scoring behavior remain unchanged).

file_operations.description: Improve canvas high-DPI/retina rendering by adopting devicePixelRatio-aware sizing and consistent logical units for rendering; ensure resize handling keeps output crisp and avoids performance regressions.

Upgrade visual rendering only (no gameplay logic changes): render layered/parallax background using frontend/public/assets/generated/ingame-background.dim_1920x1080.png when Reduced Motion is off; add vignette/atmospheric overlay; switch player rendering from simple shapes to a sprite-based draw using frontend/public/assets/generated/ui-icons-sheet.dim_1024x1024.png; enhance token/hazard sprite lighting/composition using frontend/public/assets/generated/token-icon.dim_256x256.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/toad-hazard-icon.dim_256x256.png.

Increase particle/VFX quality (visual-only): add support for richer particle attributes (e.g., size curves, rotation, soft fade) while keeping particle spawning semantics and gameplay outcomes unchanged.

Create a lightweight renderer-focused asset cache/loader that centralizes loading for frontend/public/assets/generated/ingame-background.dim_1920x1080.png, token-icon.dim_256x256.png, toad-hazard-icon.dim_256x256.png, and ui-icons-sheet.dim_1024x1024.png to avoid redundant Image construction and help maintain stable frame times.

requirements.summary: Polish UI to AAA-level presentation across Landing, HUD, Results, Leaderboard, Settings, and Shop using premium backgrounds/overlays and cohesive custom icons while keeping all flows and English text intact.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing and Results screens use the upgraded high-fidelity menu background and logo assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.
HUD/Dialogs/Shop/Leaderboard maintain the same functionality and navigation, but visuals look more premium (improved iconography/visual detail) without changing feature behavior.
All user-facing text remains English (no new non-English strings introduced).

file_operations.description: Add a small UI helper that renders icons from frontend/public/assets/generated/ui-icons-sheet.dim_1024x1024.png (custom cohesive iconography) so HUD/dialogs can reduce reliance on generic iconography while preserving existing behavior.

Upgrade HUD visual polish without changing functionality: use the GeneratedIcon (from ui-icons-sheet.dim_1024x1024.png) for key HUD iconography, refine panel treatments (premium overlays), and keep all existing labels/values and interactions unchanged.
Upgrade leaderboard visuals while keeping tabs/data the same: incorporate GeneratedIcon-based iconography and premium header/background treatments consistent with the upgraded menu aesthetic.

Upgrade settings dialog styling and iconography using GeneratedIcon while keeping the same toggles, key binding inputs, and English text unchanged; ensure Reduced Motion messaging remains consistent with existing behavior.
Upgrade shop visuals with cohesive custom iconography (GeneratedIcon) and premium card styling while keeping costs, unlock flow, and English strings unchanged.
Polish pause overlay presentation (premium overlay treatment) and align iconography with the custom icon set while keeping pause/resume/settings flows unchanged.

Add small global styling adjustments to support the AAA UI look (e.g., consistent backdrop/overlay treatments and image rendering defaults) without altering user-facing text or immutable UI component paths.
